item.description:
Walk along the Charles River bike path from Waltham to Watertown and back. The trail includes a suspended pedestrian bridge over the river and several decks built over the water.

Meet outside of Skellig's at 1:30. Park in the Embassy parking facility - enter off of Pine Street.

Afterwards go for coffee or ice cream at:
Cafe On the Common
677 Main St, Waltham, MA (corner of Moody and Main)
781-647-2456


Need a ride? Please ask for one in your rsvp, saying what area you are in.
item.name: Charles River west
